description: Police dismantled the makeshift camp, tipped migrants out of their tents, and used tear gas.
title: Paris police in 'shocking' clash at migrant camp
title_page: Paris police in 'shocking' clash at migrant camp - BBC News
maintext: The huge surge in migration to Europe via the Mediterranean in 2015, fuelled by the Syrian civil war and other conflicts, has declined, but many asylum seekers still live in precarious conditions in the continent, homeless and unemployed.
